    • validatePDF

      protected void validatePDF(ChEmedEprDocumentPmlc pmlcDocument, byte[] pdf) throws PdfValidationException
      Validates the generated document using a different PDF/A-1 PDF/A-2 validator (not from husky). If the document does not pass validation, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      pmlcDocument - The document for which the PDF has been generated.
      pdf - The byte array of the generated PDF.
      Throws:
      PdfValidationException - If the generated PDF failed to pass PDF/A-1 or A-2 validation.
